original_text: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before it grew: for the Lord God had not caused it to rain upon the earth, and there was not a man to till the ground.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 땅에 비를 내리지 아니하셨고 땅을 갈 사람도 없었으므로 들에는 초목이 아직 없었고 밭에는 채소가 나지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 들의 식물이 땅에 있기 전에

sentences.original_text: and every herb of the field before it grew
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 들의 풀이 자라기 전에

sentences.original_text: for the Lord God had not caused it to rain upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주 하나님이 땅에 비를 내리지 않으셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and there was not a man to till the ground
